00182             void setEndPointMomentum(const G4Track* aTrack) {
00183                 G4ThreeVector p = aTrack->GetMomentum();
00184                 double px = p.x();
00185                 double py = p.y();
00186                 double pz = p.z();
00187                 if (px == -0) px = 0;
00188                 if (py == -0) py = 0;
00189                 if (pz == -0) pz = 0;
00190                 endPointMomentum_.set(px, py, pz);
00191             }
00192 
00193             const G4ThreeVector& getEndPointMomentum() const {
00194                 return endPointMomentum_;
00195             }
